plot: Alfons is a desperate father that is trying to recover his daughter from someone who is blackmailing him. But the consequences of his acts won't be as he expected.
title: Cenizas
plot_es: Alfons is a desperate father that is trying to recover his daughter from someone who is blackmailing him. But the consequences of his acts won't be as he expected.
plot_en: Alfons is a desperate father that is trying to recover his daughter from someone who is blackmailing him. But the consequences of his acts won't be as he expected.
